title: Google\Cloud\Dialogflow\V2\FaqAnswer
name: FaqAnswer
description:
Represents answer from "frequently asked questions".

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.dialogflow.v2.FaqAnswer

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.answer
params.description: The piece of text from the source knowledge base document.

params.name: data.confidence
params.description: The system's confidence score that this Knowledge answer is a good match for this conversational query, range from 0.0 (completely uncertain) to 1.0 (completely certain).

params.name: data.source
params.description: Indicates which Knowledge Document this answer was extracted from. Format: projects/<Project ID>/locations/<Location ID>/agent/knowledgeBases/<Knowledge Base ID>/documents/<Document ID>.

params.name: data.metadata
params.description: A map that contains metadata about the answer and the document from which it originates.

params.name: data.answer_record
params.description: The name of answer record, in the format of "projects//locations//answerRecords/"
